title: Game Dropping after champ select
body: Hey im having a problem, after champ select my game does not go into the game loading screen, it just simply drops the game and i go to my desktop instead. If i try to run league again it says another instance of the game is already running, however i cant find any presence of the 1st one

replies.body:
Hey Judgeyrocks, 

This is the case of a ghost game. I know this message is a bit late to help you, BUT if you ever run into this issue again and you end up in a ghost game just wait about 2 hours and the issue should clear up. 

Hope you're back in the Rift slaying some Champ's. Good luck.
